name: Bud™ Pendant Shade
description: Bud resembles a flower on the cusp of opening and encloses your light fitting with the same elegance and care with which a flower Bud surrounds its petals. The overlapping petals create shapes of differing brightness when illuminated. The openings at the top and bottom allow direct lighting without exposing the viewer to the glare of the light source. You can add this touch of botanical elegance and style to any pendant fitting in your home quickly and easily with its universal hanger. Bud is intended for use with energy saving compact fluorescent light bulbs or LED bulbs. “With Bud we set out with the idea of creating a pendant shade that resembled a flower Bud, a shape that evokes spring's promise of lushness to come. We created a deliberately overlapping form between the elements. When the light is turned on the differing brightness in this form changes and enhances the appearance of Bud. A nod to the change of shape from Bud to flower. We hope you like the results” Trent & Tom Product Dimensions: 45cm Diameter x 29cm deep Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.

name: Remember Me™ Key Hook - Wild Edition
description: Remember me is a fun key hook for your wall. It gives you 2 key hooks and a key fob with a wildlife illustration on it, but there’s more too it than just that. We think that products are all about stories. The story of how they came to be in the first place, the story of how it fits into and brightens up the owners life, the story of what happens to it at the end and Remember Me also tells a story with its illustration. Each key hook shows a scene of animals with a predator just about to strike, but...... The predator is on the key fob. Take it out and the little prey is safe, leave it in and the danger remains. Remember Me fixes to the wall with some clever sticky pads that are very strong but can also be removed without damaging paint or tearing wallpaper, just in case you should you ever want to take it off the wall.

name: Bloom™ Pendant Shade
description: Bloom is inspired by the full blossom of summer. It spreads its petals out revealing the soft brightness at its centre. The light plays off the flowing curves and produces ever changing shapes when you look around the pendant. Bloom casts light upwards and downwards without exposing the direct glare of the bulb. You can easily bring this hint of summer to any pendant fitting quickly and easily with its universal hanger. Bloom is intended for use with energy saving compact fluorescent light bulbs or LED bulbs. With Bloom we wanted to break away from the straight lines and geometric shapes of some of our other lights and design a form that resembled something you might see in nature. A flower with the bright light at its centre seemed the right thing. The shapes illuminate and reflect the light differently around the whole pendant giving it visual richness from every angle. We hope it brings a touch of summer to your home - Trent & Tom Product Dimensions: 53cm Diameter x 25cm deep Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.

name: Grow™ Plant Labelling Kit
description:
What to give as a present to a keen gardener? We were pondering that question and thought that generally plant labels are pretty dull things. Now our plant labels enhance the looks of the garden. We think there are two kinds of gardeners, the ones that think gardens are there to be productive and give you lots of veg and those who think gardens are there to look beautiful. To satisfy both we have a labeling kit for veg gardeners called Grow and for flower gardeners a kit called Forget Me Not.

Grow contains 10 labels in the shape of a root veg and come in a nice recycled cardboard pack with a white weatherproof marker pencil. The pencil can be wiped off, so that the plant label is reusable for next season but doesn't wash off with the rain. Packaged in compostable or recyclable cardboard packaging.

options.name: Bulk bundle of 5 Grow Label Packs

name: Float™ Mobile
description: Float was originally design as part of the Six Cities Design Festival but prooved so popular that we have kept it on as a regular product. Float is sold as a self assembly kit and has has all the bits needed to make the mobile and give you a warm glow of achievement when you hang it up and admire your (and a little bit of our) handiwork. But don't worry it is designed in a way so you don't need to tie loads of knots and is very easy to do, but a little time consuming to put together. Float is available in three colours, White, Black and Transparent. Now you have just read this your probably thinking what's the point is a transparent mobile,,, good question. The transparent version is designed to be hung in your window, it doesn't obscure the view but it does cast wonderful shadows dancing around your room as the sun shines through it. Good to know Float: Comes in a smart floating box which seems to hover as if by magic (it sits on little hidden feet, doesn't relay use magic) Is all made from the same material (even the string), so it is fully recyclable Flyers attach in a way that doesn’t require tying knots keeps it close to home. Designed and made in Britain

name: Tempest™ Pendant Shade
description: Tempest brings interest and excitement to any interior. The unique form twists and turns in and out of itself resembling the shape at the heart of a galaxy or the centre of a vortex. The hidden openings let the brightness within escape without exposing the glare of the bulb. The undulations of the surfaces bounce the light into the room and its varying layers produce changing intensities of brightness on the surface. Tempest is intended for use with energy saving compact fluorescent light bulbs or LED bulbs. “With Tempest we wanted to design a pendant shade with real visual excitement and a bit of complexity, whilst making sure it is still straightforward to put together. We also wanted to conceal the bulb from view and let the light escape through discreet, almost hidden openings in the core of the structure. As a result Tempest gives a bright and wonderfully diffused light. We hope you enjoy it.” Trent & Tom Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required. Product Dimensions: 39cm Diameter x 21.5cm deep

name: Low Cut™ Stool / Table
description: Designed as a stool, or an occasional table, or an ottoman, this fold away, jack of all trades will easily fulfil many needs. Low Cut can be folded flat for storage and assembled with ease, ready for use in seconds. Being made from a single component there are no parts to loose and it's easy to recycle. Low Cut is a great item for every home, an ideal companion to i b pop and also well suited for use at events and exhibitions. Low Cut is suitable for indoor or outdoor use. Supplement: The packaging of Low Cut has two additional products cut into it. You can remove these and fold them into two useful cardboard containers, so don’t recycle the packaging until you have removed your supplements.

name: Cog Classic™ Pendant Shade
description: Cog Classic brings warm bright light to your interior with its softly illuminated slices emanating light from its core. Its sleek shape is practical, striking and its classic proportions elegantly bridge the gap between, traditional and modern interiors. Blue Marmalade: When we produce a product for you we always make sure that it works well, looks great (in our opinion, anyway) and it has a clear eco conscience. So we design out nasty chemicals and processes and use low energy ways of making them. We use recycled materials whenever we can (and with cog intimo we can) and ensure they remain recyclable. Every product we make has been designed so that it is really simple to recycle and we promise to take it back for recycling at the end of its life. We do all this because we think we should, to benefit the environment and the people who make our products, but most of all for you, so that you can have a product that you’re happy with and can feel really good about. Product Dimensions: 21cm Diameter x 30cm deep Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.

name: Cog Intimo™ Pendant Shade
description: Cog Intimo brings warm bright light to your interior, no matter whether you use it in an intimate space, like over a dining table, or proudly position it as the main room light. Its sleek shape is practical, striking and can be the start or the finishing touch of your modern interior. Blue Marmalade: When we produce a product for you we always make sure that it works well, looks great (in our opinion, anyway) and it has a clear eco conscience. So we design out nasty chemicals and processes and use low energy ways of making them. We use recycled materials whenever we can (and with Cog Intimo we can) and ensure they remain recyclable. Every product we make has been designed so that it is really simple to recycle and we promise to take it back for recycling at the end of its life. We do all this because we think we should, to benefit the environment and the people who make our products, but most of all for you, so that you can have a product that you’re happy with and can feel really good about. Product Dimensions: 30cm Diameter x 21cm deep Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.

options.name: London Underground Edition | pre-assembled by a pro

description:
What to give as a present to a keen gardener? We were pondering that question and thought that generally plant labels are pretty dull things. Now our plant labels enhance the looks of the garden. We think there are two kinds of gardeners, the ones that think gardens are there to be productive and give you lots of veg and those who think gardens are there to look beautiful. To satisfy both we have a labeling kit for veg gardeners called Grow and for flower gardeners a kit called Forget Me Not.

Forget Me Not contains 10 labels in the shape of a flower and comes in a nice recycled cardboard pack with a white weatherproof marker pencil. The pencil can be wiped off, so that the plant label is reusable for next season but doesn't wash off with the rain. Packaged in compostable or recyclable cardboard packaging.

options.name: Bulk Bundle of 5 Forget Me Not Label Packs

name: Cog Intimo™ Underground Edition Pendant Shade
description: Cog Intimo Underground Edition brings warm bright light to your interior with its softly illuminated slices emanating light from its core. Its sleek shape is practical, striking and its classic proportions elegantly bridge the gap between, traditional and modern interiors. But the Underground Version brings an elegant splash of colour with the Underground Map featured in the three slices. The London tube map is our kind of design. It's colourful, clear, useful, there is a method behind it and looks amazing, in fact it is just all round brilliant. Imagine how excited we were when we got asked to design some products incorporating this icon of graphic communication. You are right, very very excited. We have tried to use the map in a fun understated way that doesn't take over your interior but adds a subtle hint of colour and intrigue. Blue Marmalade: When we produce a product for you we always make sure that it works well, looks great (in our opinion, anyway) and it has a clear eco conscience. So we design out nasty chemicals and processes and use low energy ways of making them. We use recycled materials whenever we can (and with cog intimo we can) and ensure they remain recyclable. Every product we make has been designed so that it is really simple to recycle and we promise to take it back for recycling at the end of its life. We do all this because we think we should, to benefit the environment and the people who make our products, but most of all for you, so that you can have a product that you’re happy with and can feel really good about. Product Dimensions: 30cm Diameter x 21cm deep Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.

name: Hollow™ Underground Edition Mood Light
description: Hollow a cheerful light that suits every room Every table lamp is basically the same, a base with the light bulb fixed to the top of it and a shade to cover it, it hasn't really evolved that far since the early days of electricity. It doesn't have to be that way. We designed Hollow so that the shade is the base and it all shines. This makes Hollow pretty versatile, it can stand on its edge or lie on its side and where it fits it can even hang off a hook. Hollow beautifully encases the energy saver bulb inside and casts a comfortable light all around without needing a huge amount of material and energy to do it. Clean, simple, fun. Box contents: (some assembly required) Hollow shell and core Cable with plug and switch Energy saver light bulb Assembly instructions Technical Information: Cable length - 2 meters Main Body Material - 100% Recycled plastic Light Bulb - Energy saver light bulbs only, light bulb included Voltage - 220 - 240V AC - 50/60Hz Plug Region - UK 3pin OR EU 2pin Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, some assembly required.

name: Hollow™ Mood Light
description: Hollow a cheerful light that suits every room Every table lamp is basically the same, a base with the light bulb fixed to the top of it and a shade to cover it, it hasn't really evolved that far since the early days of electricity. It doesn't have to be that way. We designed Hollow so that the shade is the base and it all shines. This makes Hollow pretty versatile, it can stand on its edge or lie on its side and where it fits it can even hang off a hook. Hollow beautifully encases the energy saver bulb inside and casts a comfortable light all around without needing a huge amount of material and energy to do it. Clean, simple, fun. Box contents: (some assembly required) Hollow shell and core Cable with plug and switch Energy saver light bulb Assembly instructions Technical Information: Cable length - 2 meters Main Body Material - 100% Recycled (or recyclable depending upon colour) plastic Light Bulb - Energy saver light bulbs only, light bulb included Voltage - 220 - 240V AC - 50/60Hz Plug Region - UK 3pin OR EU 2pin Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, some assembly required.

name: Stealth™ Lamp
description: Stealth , a light designed to please whatever your mood. Its colour can be changed to enhance any interior or suit whatever mood you want to create. Either standing discretely on the floor, or dominantly placed on a surface, Stealth's presence can be as subtle or as striking and dramatic as you wish to make it. Not just a good looking lamp, but Stealth will cost you less to run than lamps with traditional bulbs. It is designed exclusively for energy-saving light bulbs and made from recycled material, so it is easy on the environment as well as your pocket. Colours Included: White, Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink Box contents: (some assembly required) Stealth main body Colour changing set Cable with plug and switch Energy saver light bulb Assembly instructions Technical Information: Cable length - 2 metres Main Body Material - 100% Recycled plastic Light Bulb - Energy saver light bulbs only, light bulb included Voltage - 220 - 240V AC - 50/60Hz Plug Region - UK 3pin OR EU 2pin Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, some assembly required.

name: Stealth Supreme™ Floor Lamp
description: Microscopes let you see things which are very small. You really don't need one of those to see Stealth Supreme. It is tall, supremely tall in fact (1.5m). It was fun to take the original Stealth and scale it up and turn it into a completely new lamp. It is even more of a statement light, a real part of an interior design scheme. Between ourselves, it is a lot more grown up, that is why have given it a dimmable bulb and a foot switch. Box contents: Instruction Booklet Cable with plug, switch and light bulb fitting High quality switch dimmable energy saver bulb 1 stealth supreme body, flat/rolled in box Cable Tidy Technical Information: Cable length - 3m Shade Material - 100% Recycled Plastic. Light Bulb - Energy saver bulbs only 20w MAX Voltage - 220 - 240V AC - 50/60Hz Plug Region - UK 3pin OR EU 2pin Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, some assembly required

name: Crease™ Magazine Rack
description:
[zipedit]

crease™: a fan of magazines

Crease neatly fans out your magazines into a display so you can see exactly what you’ve got, no more rummaging through big stacks trying to find the right one. The gentle curves of crease give it an elegant defined shape and turns your magazines into a graphic display rather than just a big pile or stack you'd rather hide away.
Crease is also big enough for the old fashioned broadsheet newspaper which you might want to keep if it takes you more than a day to get through.
The chic glossy material we use to make crease is a 100% recycled plastic and it has a bit of character. The recycled nature means each piece is different and might have picked up the odd small mark along the way, this means the finish on no two creases is exactly the same.

Crease is packaged flat in a smart cardboard case which also has two containers designed into it for you to press out. You can use them to collect the unwanted advertising supplements that come with every magazine and recycle them together with their contents when they are full. We call those containers “supplement”.

“It struck us that if you fanned out a stack of magazine it would be easier to see what was there and would look good, too. The idea of the curved base then lead onto the overall curvaceous form of the magazine holder. We think, if you have a nice magazine, don't hide it behind another. We also wanted to give the packaging another use, so we have designed two supplementary containers into it for all the annoying advertising inserts that come with nearly every magazine” Trent & Tom

Good to know:
Good for you:
Doesn't mark your floor
Doesn't slide around on your carpet
Fans out your magazines and shows off the graphic designers work
Is packaged flat in a tough, easy to carry recycled cardboard case
The carry case can be made into two containers to hold advertising supplements (also known as paper recycling)

Good for all:
No landfill waste created during production
No staples, stitches or hot melt glue is used in its packaging, leaving it easy to recycle
Designed and made in Britain for a low carbon footprint
Takes up little space with its natural recyclable cardboard packaging
Is made with R&R (recycled and recyclable materials), respite for the planet


Material:
100% Recycled Plastic


Packaging:
Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.


Product Dimensions:
45cm x 22.5cm x 23cm

name: Polyrap™ Wastepaper Basket Bin
description: So what does an aspiring new product design company, that wants to put the environment at the heart of all its designs, produce as its first product? A bin, yes that right back in 2002 we designed a bin as our first product because we wanted to immediately address the waste that's produced in our day to day lives. It all began with a pencil. Trent needed something on his desk to sharpen his pencil into so he folded a bit of waste paper in to a simple container for his pencil shavings. This desktop container was the spark for Polyrap and we spent some time working out the folds, sketching out solutions (we are back to the pencil) and developed it into the smart Polyrap waste paper bin it is now. The developed product was designed to be made from a single recycled plastic piece, an easy, welcoming shape to fill and empty and easy to clean. We also wanted it to be a smaller sized bin, because with a growing opportunity to sort more of our waste for recycling, that is what we need. More smaller bins, that we can empty into the different recycling containers, which can be easily unfolded for cleaning and therefore don't need a bin liner. Good to know Polyrap: Is easy to clean. Just unfold it, wipe it clean and refold it. Is eco, because it is made from recycled and recyclable material and doesn't need a bin liner. Is flat-packed, so there is no problem with storage. comes in 5 different colours: red, white, ice blue, grey and pink. Is packaged flat in a funky carry case made from recycled board. (another bag saved) Easy to empty as its shaped like a pouring spout when turned upside down. Keeps it close to home. Designed and made in Britain.

name: Cog Classic™ Underground Edition Pendant Shade
description: Cog Classic Underground Edition brings warm bright light to your interior with its softly illuminated slices emanating light from its core. Its sleek shape is practical, striking and its classic proportions elegantly bridge the gap between, traditional and modern interiors. But the Underground Version brings an elegant splash of colour with the Underground Map featured in the three slices. The London tube map is our kind of design. It's colourful, clear, useful, there is a method behind it and looks amazing, in fact it is just all round brilliant. Imagine how excited we were when we got asked to design some products incorporating this icon of graphic communication. You are right, very very excited. We have tried to use the map in a fun understated way that doesn't take over your interior but adds a subtle hint of colour and intrigue. Blue Marmalade: When we produce a product for you we always make sure that it works well, looks great (in our opinion, anyway) and it has a clear eco conscience. So we design out nasty chemicals and processes and use low energy ways of making them. We use recycled materials whenever we can (and with cog classic we can) and ensure they remain recyclable. Every product we make has been designed so that it is really simple to recycle and we promise to take it back for recycling at the end of its life. We do all this because we think we should, to benefit the environment and the people who make our products, but most of all for you, so that you can have a product that you’re happy with and can feel really good about. Product Dimensions: 21cm Diameter x 30cm deep Material: 100% recycled plastic Packaging: Flat pack in retail packaging, assembly required.

name: Remember Me™ Key Hook - Underground Edition All Lines
description: The London tube map is our kind of design. It is colourful, clear, useful, there is a method behind it and looks amazing, in fact it is just all round brilliant. Imagine how excited we were when we got asked to design some products incorporating this icon of graphic communication. You are right, very very excited. We have tried to use the map in all its splendour with Remember Me all lines key hooks, the series of four each have a section of the map on their face and four join together to form zone 1. Remember Me fixes to the wall with some very clever sticky pads that are very strong but can also be removed without damaging paint or tearing wallpaper should you ever want to remove it.

name: Remember Me™ Key Hook - Underground Edition Pure Lines
description: The London tube map is our kind of design. It is colourful, clear, useful, there is a method behind it and looks amazing, in fact it is just all round brilliant. Imagine how excited we were when we got asked to design some products incorporating this icon of graphic communication. You are right, very very excited. We have tried to use the map in a quirky colourful and slightly different way with the Pure Lines edition, as opposed to the map in all its original splendour with the All Lines Edition. In this series of six each features an individual line a a section of the line from the map with the line name on the key fob. Remember Me fixes to the wall with some very clever sticky pads that are very strong but can also be removed without damaging paint or tearing wallpaper should you ever want to remove it.

name: Envelope Angel® Letter Opener
description: If you tear open your envelope you can't reuse it, but if you break through the gum seal you are left with a perfectly reusable envelope. As long as you have a label to cover the previous address, now I wonder what one could use for that..... Our nifty envelope angel opener helps you slice through that gum seal leaving the envelope ready for another outing. Good to know Envelope Angel opener: Is the none destructive way of opening envelopes Slices through the gum seal on an envelope. Works best on the self seal envelopes Comes in a recycled cardboard pack Is made with R&R (recycled and recyclable materials), respite for the planet Keeps it close to home. Designed and made in Britain

name: Envelope Angel® Re-use Labels
description: We think reusing padded envelopes is a brilliant idea. Some of them are not easily recyclable and anyway, why recycle them if you can send them on another journey. Envelope Angel is a label set that lets you re-address a used envelope with smart address and sender labels that lets the recipient know you are an envelope saviour, (not just a skin-flint). The set consists of an address and a sender label. 100 re-address labels and 100 sender labels per box. Envelope Angel: Is the stylish way to reuse envelopes Comes in a recycled cardboard pack that doubles as a smart desktop dispenser. Consists of a separate address and sender label Sender label is sized to cover the original postage (or can be used to re-seal the envelope) Self adhesive, no licking required Keeps it close to home. Designed and made in Britain

name: Envelope Angel® Re-use Labels - Underground Edition
description: We think reusing padded envelopes is a brilliant idea. Some of them are not easily recyclable and anyway, why recycle them if you can send them on another journey. Envelope Angel is a label set that lets you re-address a used envelope with smart address and sender labels that lets the recipient know you are an envelope saviour, (not just a skin-flint). The set consists of an address and a sender label. Envelope Angel: Is the stylish way to reuse envelopes Comes in a recycled cardboard pack that doubles as a smart desktop dispenser. Consists of a separate address and sender label Sender label is sized to cover the original postage (or can be used to re-seal the envelope) Self adhesive, no licking required Keeps it close to home. Designed and made in Britain

name: Bi-Clip™ Reference Marker / Book Mark - Magenta Edition
description: re-usable page marker and multi purpose clips sold in strips of six Limited Edition Bi-Clip with three sharp magenta patterns on them! Spots, Starts and Stripes. Bi-clip is called Bi-Clip because it has more than one use and is a by-product. To make our lighting products we have to cut out holes for the light-fittings to fit through. The perfect discs that used to fill those holes are far too good to just throw away. Instead we turn them into Bi-Clip. Want to mark a line of text in a book or a magazine you are reading? Use a Bi-Clip, the point will pick out the exact line you want to find again. Need a book mark? Use a Bi-Clip. Want to hold some pieces of paper together, to keep yourself organised. Use a Bi-Clip. Good to know Bi-Clip: Will point to a line of text on a page, that you want to come back to. Is ideal for reading on the go, "mark your spot before you stop" Will keep pieces of paper together to keep them organised is a handy book mark Uses material that would normally be discarded. Keeps it close to home. Designed and made in Britain
